name: Infinite Galaxy Shooting
description:
Infinite Galaxy Shooting is a Galaxy Shooter striking Game. You’re last hopeful of Earth against alien and different dangerous animal, your mission is control Fighter and join the battle to save Earth from the space attacker.

Features:
- High quality images optimized for tablets and large screens.
- Ability to use active skills during the space battles.
- Beautiful levels with immersive missions to complete.
- Amazing lighting and special effects
